oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Claude King and Gene Williams at the Country Showcase
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: King, Claude, 1923-2013; Carlisle, Bill;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing Claude King with Bill Carlisle, Charlie Feathers, Gene Williams Show, Johnny Duncan, Eddie Bond and others at the Gene Williams Country Showcase at the Music Mountain Theater on April 6. Poster features metal photoplates of Claude King, Bill Carlisle and Gene Williams.
